name: Path Fighter A new reborn
description:
Path Fighter v.1.0 - 

Beat'em up fighting in seven levels.

Fullfill the ambition of the Dojo.

You trained hard in a Monastery.

Now it is time to pay back. Fight

opponents in this Beat'em up game.

Good graphics and sounds for 59 EUR.

Runs on different Systems in your

Browser. This program is Shareware.
